title: All Ball - Pt. 2: Former All-B1G Center Star Brian Butch Talks Crazy Overseas Pro Stories, Transition to Broadcasting
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 2: Former All-B1G Center Star Brian Butch Talks Crazy Overseas Pro Stories, Transition to Broadcasting
description:
In the second part of a two-part interview, Doug continues his conversation with former Wisconsin star center Brian Butch about his NBA Summer League experience, good, bad and ugly overseas stories, the D-League grind, why he called it quits and how he decided to transition into broadcasting. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
